summary: A FEW DAYS BEFORE THE LIGHT FOR AIRBAGS CAME ON THE CRUISE WOULD ONLY WORK PERIODICALLY THEN STOPPED. THEN WHILE GOING MAIL BOX TO MAILBOX. TURNING STEERING TO LEFT TO PULL AWAY FROM BOX THE AIRBAG LIGHT WOULD COME ON AND A WARNING SOUND. I CALLED DEALER THEY SAID IT SOUNDED LIKE A CLOCKSPRING ISSUE. BUT WHILE THEY LIGHT IS ON THEY SAID THE AIRBAGS WON'T DEPLOY.   *TR
